argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpidcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | grpidcl.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_mndidcl | |- ( G e. Mnd -> .0. e. B ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. Grp -> .0. e. B ) |
